div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version 📍 where concept descends from 86273004 (Biopsy)

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Exclude codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version 📍 where concept descends from 8889005 (Excisional biopsy)
Exclude codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct version 📍 where concept descends from 70871006 (Incisional biopsy)

description.value: Set de valores utilizados para los procedimientos al momento de extraer muestras de tejido
